bossDialog: (The Calumnier coils itself around the treasure hoard, its scales gleaming as it hisses a challenge. Its tail swishes back and forth, ready to strike!)
(The Calumnier gives you a predatory smile as it slithers forward, blocking your path to the treasure with surprising speed and aggression!)
You dare to think yourself worthy of these treasures? I'll add your bones to my collection after I've finished with you!

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures gain 3% (additive) more benefit from their Personalities.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures gain 3% (additive) more benefit from their Personalities.
cardBonuses.6: Your creatures gain 3% (additive) more benefit from their Personalities.

master.dialog: Calumniers are strategic fighters with scales harder than forged steel. When they work together, they're practically invincible! Their elegant yet deadly fighting style has earned them respect across all of Rodia. You'll soon learn why my Calumniers are feared in battle - their scales gleam brightest when covered in enemy blood!
master.name: Lysandre

name: Calumnier
